item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>The thing which most appeals to me is taking this beyond just the standard Notes classes and making application specific ones. A JS file for each user's profile for example. It could have enourmous potential.<br /><br />Yes I completely agree, it would be great if you could publish what you have in the form to get people going.<br /><br />Matt</p>
item.content:encoded:
The thing which most appeals to me is taking this beyond just the standard Notes classes and making application specific ones. A JS file for each user’s profile for example. It could have enourmous potential.

Yes I completely agree, it would be great if you could publish what you have in the form to get people going.

Matt

item.title: By: Jake Howlett
item.dc:creator: Jake Howlett
item.description: <p>Glad you like it and that you saw past the post being Ext and the potential it offers us all.<br/><br /><br/><br />Maybe I should post a Zip of an NSF with just this Form in it...<br/><br /><br/><br />Jake</p>
item.content:encoded:
Glad you like it and that you saw past the post being Ext and the potential it offers us all.

Maybe I should post a Zip of an NSF with just this Form in it…

Jake
